summary: A determined priest and a Communist mayor develop a grudging friendship in spite of their official rivalry.
cast: Fernandel|Gino Cervi|Vera Talchi|Franco Interlenghi|Sylvie|Charles Vissières|Clara Auteri Pepe|Italo Clerici|Peppino De Martino|Carlo Duse|Manuel Gary|Leda Gloria|Luciano Manara|Armando Migliari|Giovanni Onorato|Franco Pesce|Mario Siletti|Olga Solbelli|Marco Tulli|Gualtiero Tumiati|Saro Urzì|Victor Rietti|Robert Rietty|Orson Welles|Giorgio Albertazzi|Emilio Cigoli|Jean Debucourt|Barbara Florian|Dina Romano|Ruggero Ruggeri
title: Don Camilo
